resources.string: need to restart the application to take effect

Waiting for timeout, please make sure your Root Manager is running in the background, and try again! 

Please make sure that you have not prevented the "Authorization Manager (SuperSu, Magisk Manager, etc.)" from starting automatically, and allow background pop-up windows, display floating windows and other permissions. If the authorization dialog box does not pop up, it is recommended to restart the phone and try again!
Sorry, I did not get the ROOT authority

Without ROOT authority, many characteristic functions will be lost. \nIf you missed the authorization prompt, or did not see the pop-up window, please find your ROOT manager and manually set to allow Scene to use ROOT permissions~
It seems that busybox is not installed on your phone, which will cause Scene to be unusable. Do you want to install it immediately (requires system modification)?
You can also try Scene, I think itâ€™s not bad, download link:\n http://vtools.omarea.com/

Scene enhanced service
You need to activate this service in order to use the following functions:

1. Dynamic response (automatically adjust performance according to the foreground application).

2. Automatic behavior (in the switch Recycle the process when switching networks or switching applications when the screen is displayed).

3. Automatic installation (automatically click next when installing third-party applications)
backup the Boot currently in use as img, copy it to /sdcard/boot.img
The export Recovery currently in use of the backup is img, and it is copied to /sdcard/recovery.img
export DTBO partition as img mirror, copy to /sdcard/dtbo.img
export Persist partition as img mirror, copy to /sdcard/persist.img
/sdcard/%s.img already exists, do you want to overwrite the existing file? \n
Insufficient storage space, please reserve at least 200M free space!
In the charging state, the screen action is delayed until the charging is completed before execution
switch SELinux to permissive mode (some software is called [Close Selinux]), SeLinux status has no effect on Scene, and opening permissive mode may crash and restart!
use the system wallpaper as the window background, displayed as a translucent interface
show the log of Scene judged the foreground application process
Display the function description prompt (question mark) icon next to the function item
automatically end the process when an exception occurs during the running process to avoid stuck white screen
When an error occurs in the Scene, click the button below to grab the log through logcat and send it to the developer in order to solve the problem
When the system is in night mode, the permanent notification of Scene will be displayed as a black background (no need to turn on this option under normal circumstances)
Click here to activate auxiliary services
If you need to use the "charging speed regulation" and "charging protection" functions, please be sure to keep Scene running in the background!

The phone will determine whether to activate USB-PD charging based on the compatibility of the phone, without manual setting. Manual switching will cause the charging speed to be slow, so manual modification is not allowed!
has entered PD fast charge mode
did not enter the PD fast charge mode
OK, if you want the phone to automatically turn on this function after restarting, please allow Scene to boot from the boot!
Charging acceleration service has been disabled, you may need to restart the phone to restore the default settings!
Adjust to slow charging when it is close to full\n\n and actively reduce the charging speed at night
Stop charging after reaching the specified power\n\nNote: Long-term use may cause the power display to be inaccurate
reached %d%% to stop charging, less than %d%% to recover

adjust the charging speed limit. The crazy increase is meaningless, because it will not achieve the actual effect, please adjust the value within the effective range\n\nNote: The upper limit value is for reference only, please refer to the actual charging speed!
The charging function has been restored!
The system adjusts the upper limit of the charging speed in stages according to the power level to help protect the battery life\n\nIt is generally recommended to keep the default settings
The purpose of charging speed regulation

Scene will perform speed changes at different times according to your choice. The specific differences are as follows

Reduce the speed: Only reset the charging speed when the charger is connected and the battery percentage changes
Accelerate charging: The battery status changes and the charging speed is reset when the charger is connected.
Charging dead: Based on the logic of [Charge Acceleration], the charging speed is automatically reset every second
charging should be displayed as a positive number, discharge should be displayed as a negative number

The application data backup function currently provided requires the system to integrate busybox and toybox, and use tar+gz to compress data (if the system supports it, pigz will be used to increase the compression speed), and only backup "/data/data /Application package name" and does not guarantee compatibility with all systems and applications. \n\nApp backup files are in /sdcard/backups/apps (Android 11+ system does not support the backup function)
model information, please do not enter special symbols! \nIt is compatible with the model code of the [application variable] module. After copying, reopen this window and you can use it!

After the modification, you can click "Restore" -> "Confirm" to restore the model before the modification. Uninstalling the Scene will result in the loss of the backup model information. Please be sure to restore and then uninstall! 

Alternatively, you can also restore the model information by flashing the complete ROM again! 

Do not use this function to modify the model when using DualBootPatcher multi-system software! ! !
This feature does not support your device temporarily!
automatically hide the status bar, navigation bar

Disable the real-time blur effect of the Flyme6 pull-down notification center to reduce the lag in the pull-down notification center of Meizu low-end devices during games or video playback. It may also save power and need to be restarted.
MIUI9 to the notification center search
Hide the search box of the MIUI9 system drop-down notification center by default, and it will take effect after restarting
Customize the phoneâ€™s DPI or resolution, which may cause the device to fail to start normally, or UI errors
By changing the build.prop camouflage model, some mobile phones may not be able to boot or bugs appear
Custom mobile phone WIFI network card MAC address, only supports some devices
Custom mobile phone WIFI network card MAC address, only supports some devices, more suitable for Android Q
dex2oat compiles the application to reduce CPU and RAM usage at runtime. The compilation process may take half an hour, and you need to recompile after the system is updated!

After Android N, in order to reduce application space occupation and improve installation efficiency, dex is no longer fully compiled when applications are installed, resulting in a decrease in operating speed. Selecting "compile" through this function will use speed mode to compile when installing the application, the installation speed is significantly slower, but the runtime is smoother (increased by about 20%, no increase in game frame rate!). 

Take the Douyu TV client under the Oreo system as an example. The base.odex was only 6.8MB when it was newly installed, and it was increased to 103MB after compilation. 

However, many domestic applications use hot update technology, and they often need to download the latest code from the server and parse and render during operation. This is the main reason for the slow startup of these applications or the stalling after startup. Therefore, dex2oat compilation cannot bring significant performance improvement for such applications!
applies to Android N+, adjust the dex2oat compilation strategy when the PackageManager application is installed, and reset the system after updating the system
resolve wpa_supplicant.conf or WifiConfigStore.xml in the /data/misc/wifi directory

Turn off some options in Performance Boost Config to prevent the CPU from being frequently pulled up and causing power consumption, but keeping the application to start up frequency will slightly reduce the experience. Need to restart!
is closing SWAP, which may be very slow
Description: \nThe higher the value, the more active SWAP will be used. The impact of this setting on fluency is difficult to perceive, and you can adjust it as appropriate~
Description: ZRAM is an implementation of SWAP. When the available memory becomes insufficient, part of the data in the memory will be compressed. But the CPU will become busy because of this~
ZRAM is in use, and the compression algorithm cannot be changed now. \n\nTo make the settings take effect, please click the "Adjust" button below
use up ZRAM and then use
and ZRAM used at the same time

If you can use SWAP normally without opening this item, there is no need to open it. 

Unless SWAP cannot be started, or the phone freezes after starting SWAP, you only need to enable this option! 

For example: Xiaomi's SDM845 model is on Android9.0, you need to check this option to use SWAP normally

Description: Swapfile is similar to the virtual memory of Windows, and the exchange efficiency is limited by the disk performance. Do not use this function on a mobile phone with a small capacity or insufficient space to prevent the flash memory from aging too quickly!
boot from start (to allow Scene to start automatically)
Note: You need to allow Scene to start automatically, it will take effect next time you boot!
you have installed the Magisk framework, it is recommended to use the latest version of the add-on module to enhance the reliability of SWAP control, the main additional functions are as follows:
1. Improve the speed of restoring ZRAM and Swapfile settings after the phone restarts
2. Adjust the LMK parameters according to the device RAM capacity to strengthen the background retention capacity
3. Adjust VM parameters to improve the enthusiasm of ZRAM and Swapfile use
After the module is downloaded, please brush in Magisk Manager by yourself, and restart the phone!
ZRAM compression rate is usually between 20~45%

Data compression algorithm: %s
Original data size: %s
Compressed size: %s
Physical memory usage: %s
Maximum memory usage: %s
Memory Occupation limit: %s
Compression rate: %s

Data compression algorithm: %s
original data size: %s
compressed size: %s
compression rateã€€ã€€ã€€:%s

ZRAM Writeback
Writeback block: %s
Written back: %dMB
Total read: %dMB
Total writeback:%dMB

This value specifies how much additional physical memory the Linux kernel will reserve. When the memory is insufficient, it will immediately begin to compress the memory to SWAP/ZRAM, and the device will obviously become slow before the available memory rises to a reasonable range\n \n Simply put, the larger the extra_free_kbytes setting, the more aggressive the memory recovery (swap or kill process), but it is not recommended to set too large, so as not to waste physical memory and increase the burden on the disk/processor!

The value range is 0~1000, where 1000 means 10%, which means that the difference between the three values â€‹â€‹of the memory water mark low/min/high (physical RAM capacity) is 10%. 

For example (my phone):
pageSize=4KB
managed=1951743(pages)
min_free_kbytes=10900(KB)
watermark_scale_factor=500

The min value is
10900(KB)/4( PageSize)=2725(pages)
low value is approximately
1951743*5%+2725â‰ˆ100312(pages)
high value is approximately
1951743*10%+2725â‰ˆ197899(pages)
Note: the final low, high The value may be too large due to extra_free_kbytes.

In this example,
min=2725=10MB
low=100312â‰ˆ392MB
high=197899â‰ˆ773MB

means that the memory will start to be recycled if it is less than 392M Memory, until the available memory is higher than 773MB~
is performing an operation, please wait...
is being adjusted, please wait patiently...
The battery is too low, please charge it in time!
not found available mode configuration script

The application does not come with a performance configuration script suitable for your mobile phone. You can select "Get the script online" to see if there is a configuration suitable for your phone available for download, or select "Learn more" to view the custom configuration tutorial!
first use, first select configuration preferences

Some mobile phones have a dynamic adjustment mechanism for CPU parameters, which will cause the customized parameters to become invalid quickly. In addition, temperature control will also restrict you from increasing the CPU frequency.
please long press to select the directory
has completed the boot from the start
Please download and install "Scene-Advanced Settings" from Scene, and set it to allow background auto-start!
from the "Scene-Advanced Settings" component synchronization Xposed settings failed!
When installing third-party applications, automatically help you point "Next" and "Install"

Automatically click the "Skip" button, which can help you automatically skip some open-screen advertisements, but it will reduce system performance and cause delays\n* It is better to use only in simplified Chinese Effect
use some button data recorded in the cloud to click the special skip button
Ad traffic is an important source of income for some software developers/businesses. If your time is not very urgent, it is recommended that you browse and click on the ad content you like^_^
Please authorize the Scene "modify system settings" first!
Please authorize and allow Scene "notification permission" first!

Scene is an application for machine enthusiasts. To use it, you need to have excellent eyesight, reading comprehension and a good attitude. 

Unforeseen errors may occur during use, resulting in data loss and even failure to boot normally. 

Please do not use it on your [for work] or the mobile phone that has [important data], so as not to cause loss! 

During use, be sure to read the prompt information carefully and operate carefully, and don't easily toggle the function options that you don't understand! 

In addition, the author of this application does not guarantee that help and troubleshooting suggestions will be provided!
Please first authorize the display of floating window permissions for Scene!

Let Scene automatically adjust the LMK parameters according to your RAM capacity, thereby enhancing the background capability (which may lead to stuttering when the memory is low). If you need to restore, please turn off this option and restart the phone. If you need to automatically set up after booting, please allow the toolbox to start automatically
Scene integrated Busybox does not support your current system, please download and install Busybox by yourself
The following is added to the bias mode of the application, the startup shortcut has been lost or not successfully created, whether to re-create it immediately?
batch adding shortcuts may fail, you can long press the application icon to send a single shortcut to the desktop!

You may need to manually delete the added shortcut!

has been sent to create a shortcut application

this function does not support adding shortcuts

Most of the modification operations of Scene to the system can now be carried out in the form of Magisk module. However, you must first agree that Scene will automatically install additional modules on your phone and restart the phone (recommended)!
The configuration file is not detected, and dynamic response has been automatically disabled!

Click the menu in the upper right corner, select and edit the temperature control file, click save after editing~

Note: As the Android system is constantly updated, it becomes more and more difficult to modify the system partition , The modification may not be saved successfully, or it will be automatically restored after restarting. It is recommended to use the magisk module to complete the temperature control modification! 

The temperature control file is generally in the /system/etc or /vendor/etc directory, the name starts with "thermal" and the suffix is ".conf"
Process Manager is not compatible with your mobile phone!
